name: Happy Farm Crush Forest Challenge - Addictive Swap Match 3 Animals Fun Puzzles Games Free
name_original: Happy Farm Crush Forest Challenge - Addictive Swap Match 3 Animals Fun Puzzles Games Free
description:
Get ready for Farm Mania time!! Start a fun-tastic puzzle solving quest, There're tons of surprises for you to discover. Come on into this amazingly tasty pet and animal farm garden mania world, and begin enjoying 500 levels of delicious challenges NOW!!!

Features:
- 500+ sweet levels to explore! (LV new update soon.)
- Easy to learn and enjoyable match 3 game for the young & young at heart!
- A new flavor of matching puzzle game, challenging and delicious.
- Unique power-ups specially designed in each levels.
- Innovative new gameplay: clear a way to collect the target animals.
